meta.name: HB E‑commerce Refactor Plan
meta.scope: Refactor to layered architecture, harden payments/webhooks, security, observability, tests, and DX. No TypeScript migration.
constraints: Stay on Next.js Pages Router for now
Network calls limited to providers already used (Pesapal, Supabase, Sanity, email, WhatsApp)
Minimize breaking changes to public API routes

goals: Adopt a clean, layered architecture (API → services → repositories → clients)
Make payments + webhooks idempotent, observable, and easy to reason about
Move inventory stock updates to post-payment (atomic with order creation)
Secure admin endpoints and standardize input validation
Unify duplicated UI components and utilities; reduce dead deps
Add structured logging, correlation IDs, and consistent error envelopes
deliverables: New server folders: services, repositories, clients, utils, config
Central Pesapal status mapper and error formatter shared across flows
Idempotent webhook/verify handling with processed-events table or key
Order creation + stock decrement in one DB transaction (RPC or SQL)
Middleware/auth guard for /api/admin/* and admin pages
Refactored components without duplicates; unified utils paths
Test suite expansion and CI pipeline updates

tasks.title: Create env config and validation layer
tasks.description: Add src/server/config/env.js that reads and validates required env vars; remove direct process.env reads in server code.
acceptance: All server modules import from env.js
Missing envs yield clear startup errors
tasks.notes: Added src/server/config/env.js; refactored pesapal lib and key API routes (verify, IPN) to use env config for Pesapal base URL and credentials.

tasks.title: Introduce structured logger and request IDs
tasks.description: Add lightweight logger (pino-like or custom wrapper) and middleware/util to attach correlation IDs to logs per request.
tasks.notes: Added logger.js and requestId.js; instrumented payments/initiate, payments/verify, and IPN routes to emit requestId-tagged logs.

tasks.title: Create server folders and move clients
tasks.description: Create clients for supabase, pesapal, sanity. Keep public supabase client in src/lib if used by browser code.
acceptance: No direct axios calls to Pesapal from handlers
tasks.notes: Added server client facades; refactored payments/initiate, verify, and IPN to use pesapal client functions (no direct axios in handlers).

tasks.title: Extract status mapper and error helpers
tasks.description: Create src/server/services/statusMap.js and src/server/utils/errors.js; refactor verify and IPN to import mapper.
acceptance: Single source-of-truth mapping used in both flows
tasks.notes: Added src/server/services/statusMap.js; verify.js and ipn.js now import and use shared mapper.

tasks.title: HTTP response helpers
tasks.description: Add http.js utilities for success/error responses with consistent envelope.
acceptance: All handlers return standardized JSON envelopes

tasks.title: Split db.js into repositories
tasks.description: Create payments.js, orders.js, inventory.js repositories. Each exposes clear methods and returns normalized data.
acceptance: API routes no longer import src/lib/db.js
tasks.notes: Repositories added; API routes updated to use them. Tests green.

tasks.title: Implement PaymentService and OrderService
tasks.description: PaymentService handles initiate/verify/IPN orchestration. OrderService handles order creation, idempotency, and stock updates.
acceptance: API handlers are thin and call services
Services encapsulate Pesapal and DB flows

tasks.title: Fix confirmation code mapping and unify status handling
tasks.description: Use response.confirmation_code everywhere; ensure status mapping uses shared statusMap.
acceptance: Tests cover mapping and confirmation_code usage
tasks.notes: verify.js now extracts payment_method and confirmation_code separately and calls updatePaymentStatus(orderTrackingId, internalStatus, paymentMethod, confirmationCode, statusDescription). IPN already correct.

tasks.title: Idempotency for webhooks/verify
tasks.description: Add processed-events key (by orderTrackingId + type) in DB or cache; handlers early-exit on duplicates.
acceptance: Repeated IPN/verify calls do not create duplicate orders or updates

tasks.title: Move stock decrement to post-payment
tasks.description: Ensure order creation + stock update happen atomically after payment completion (RPC or transaction). Remove pre-decrement in checkout API.
acceptance: No stock changes before successful payments

tasks.title: Background processing for IPN
tasks.description: Keep immediate 200 ACK; run processing off-thread (setImmediate) with retry strategy. Optionally add a lightweight queue later.

tasks.title: Admin auth guard
tasks.description: Protect /api/admin/* and admin pages with auth check (NextAuth or Supabase auth) and RBAC middleware.

tasks.title: Input validation with Zod (JS)
tasks.description: Add per-route Zod schemas for body/query validation in payment, inventory, notify endpoints.
acceptance: Invalid requests get 400 with helpful messages

tasks.title: Rate limiting
tasks.description: Add simple in-memory or edge-friendly rate limiter for initiate/verify/webhook/notify routes.

tasks.title: Remove duplicate components and unify imports
tasks.description: Keep single versions of Navbar, CartDrawer, cartIcon (.jsx). Update all imports.
tasks.notes: Removed duplicate .js components: Navbar.js, CartDrawer.js, cartIcon.js. Ensured .jsx versions remain primary; imports resolve correctly. All tests green.

tasks.title: Rename cloudinary util and move to utils
tasks.description: Fix Retreival→Retrieval typo; colocate under src/utils and update imports.
acceptance: Single source of cloudinary URL building
tasks.notes: Added src/utils/cloudinaryImageRetrieval.js, removed src/util/cloudinaryImageRetreival.js. No callsites found; safe rename.

tasks.title: Font loading consistency
tasks.description: Standardize on next/font or link tags. Prefer next/font for Chakra integration; remove duplicates.

tasks.title: Unit tests for services and repositories
tasks.description: Add vitest tests for PaymentService, OrderService, and repos. Mock external clients via MSW or spies.

tasks.title: Contract tests for Pesapal status mapping
tasks.description: Test a matrix of Pesapal responses to ensure consistent internal statuses and fields.

tasks.title: E2E flows for success/failure + idempotency
tasks.description: Playwright tests for cart→checkout→callback. Simulate duplicate IPN/verify calls and ensure no duplicate orders.

tasks.title: CI pipeline updates
tasks.description: Run lint, unit, and e2e on PR; add coverage report and fail thresholds.
acceptance: CI blocks merges on failing tests/lint

risks.risk: Behavioral regressions from moving server code
risks.mitigation: Phase-by-phase PRs with tests and feature flags if needed
Single transaction in DB; use row-level locks in RPC
Central env validator; CI preflight checks

metrics: Payment success/failure rate and verification latency
Order creation time and error rate
acceptance_criteria: API handlers are slim (< ~80 lines) and delegate to services
Single status mapper used by both IPN and verify
No duplicate React components or util files
Stock never decremented before payment completes
Admin endpoints require auth and enforce RBAC
>=80% coverage on new server code; existing tests still pass

timeline.total_estimate: 7–12 days (depending on validation depth and CI)
